dict.acceptation: 仅仅，只不过；只是；纯粹；全然；

sent.orig: But the Celtics didn't merely play a dirty brand of defense.
sent.trans: 不过凯尔特人队不仅仅是做出了有点脏的防守。

sent.orig: Today many friendships are not real; people are merely paying lip service to one another.
sent.trans: 今天许多的友谊都不纯真；人们彼此只是说些应酬话。

sent.orig: The vindictive feeling called "moral indignation" is merely a form of cruelty.
sent.trans: 所谓“义愤”的复仇感，不过是残忍的一种形式。

sent.orig: It is merely the positing of a thing, or of certain determinations in it.
sent.trans: 它仅仅是在它一件事情，或某些决心安置。

sent.orig: QQ lovely, delicate. Different prices in different packaging. The material is merely pocket cards.
sent.trans: QQ可爱，精巧。不同包装价格不同。本品是单只卡袋装。
